mapper.select:
select
,
from topic_fragment where id >= #{fid} and topic_id=#{topicId} and status=1 and at_uid = #{uid} and type in (10 ,11 ,15) order by id desc limit 1

select
,
from topic_fragment where topic_id=#{topicId} and ((type=0 and content_type=1) or (type=54 and content_type=51)) and status=1 and DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m')=#{month} order by id asc
